entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
